nodes.title: Victory! Greta Thunberg is TIME Magazine's Person of the Year
nodes.description:
Greta Thunberg has been named TIME Magazine's Person of the Year for 2019. Greta is known for being an outspoken leader and vocal in the climate crisis, mobilizing an incredible following of youth to become involved activists. 

Greta accepted the honor in a tweet the same day as the announcement.  In the tweet, she said she shares "this great honour with everyone in the #FridaysForFuture movement and climate activists everywhere."

embeddedMedia.description: The climate activist has succeeded in turning vague anxieties about the planet into a worldwide movement calling for global change

nodes.title: Greta is Included in TIME's Person of the Year Poll
nodes.description:
We are only a few weeks or less away from the announcement of TIME's Person of the Year for 2019! In the lead up to the announcement, the magazine has released an online poll where you can vote for who you believe should be awarded this recognition. 

Along with many other influential people, Greta Thunberg was included in the poll TIME Magazine posted online. You can access this poll, as well as vote for her, by clicking the link that is included in this update. 

What do you think? Could this petition become a reality? The poll that includes Greta in the list of possibilities sure makes it look possible! Be sure to continue to sign and share this petition as the countdown continues until the announcement.

embeddedMedia.description: Cast your vote for the person or group of people you believe should be TIME's Person of the Year for 2019.

nodes.title: Donna Brazile Supports this Petition
nodes.description:
Last week, Donna Brazile gave a short statement of support for this petition and for Greta Thunberg. 

"Greta Thunberg deserves recognition as TIME's Person of the Year," said Brazile. "I have decided to follow this young warrior. She is inspirational and a wonderful example for her generation." 

Brazile is one of the many politicians and celebrities to support Greta Thunberg, but is the first to announce support for this petition. 

Why do you believe Greta should be named TIME's Person of the Year? Please continue to support and share this petition- as we are less than one month away until the announcement will be made.

nodes.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger and Leonardo DiCaprio Support Greta
nodes.description:
It's been a big week of celebrity meet-ups for Greta Thunberg. Last Friday, Greta met up with Leonardo DiCaprio to discuss their commitment to fighting climate change. After their time spent together, he posted pictures of them on his Instagram account and called her a "leader of our time." 

The next day, Greta got together with another Hollywood star, Arnold Schwarzenegger, and went cycling in Santa Monica. He later posted a picture of them together on Instagram and called her a "hero." He had already loaned her an electric car to help her travel around the US. 

These two celebrities are not the only ones to voice their support of Greta. Others, like Barack Obama, Kim Kardashian, Priyanka Chopra, and John Legend have also taken to social media to support Greta. 

Now, we ask you to continue to support and share this petition so we can see Greta earn the recognition she deserves and be named as TIME Magazine's Person of the Year.

embeddedMedia.description: The day after 16-year-old climate activist Greta Thunberg met Leonardo DiCaprio, who described her as "a leader of our time", her effort to highlight the global climate crisis has seen her meet with another Hollywood star - Arnold Schwarzenegger.

nodes.title: Update #1
nodes.description: If you would like to receive updates on whether Greta Thunberg has been named as TIME's Person of the Year please fill out this form below. Fill it out here: https://forms.gle/LnSEv1CR7Nfg6CvdA
